环境极差~队友能比我还菜真的~我一个胆小且卑微的蘑菇修机人居然还有那么多跟人机一样，甚至感觉比人机都菜，局局白给，真就能比我这个一点不夸张被砍一刀能吓得把鼠标扔出去的彩笔还菜？？？屠夫开挂就不说什么了，玩屠夫都是会玩的溜鬼人皇~自己一匹配人就被坑，不，是必被坑~拔线玩家还那么多，真的是极差。
游戏环境什么的确实是开发商改变不了的，但是那些奇怪的小bug和外挂管管可以么~实在是让人难受

Very fun and enjoyable to play. The new server system makes this game a lot better. Most of the time, you won't have to wait in a buggy lobby. But I would love the game to launch special campaign for new comers such as 2x Bloodpoint for new players so we could catch up with current players.

처음에 유튜버를 통해 보고 뭔 저런 공포겜을 하지라는 인상을 받았었다.
그러다 하도 오래 보니 게임을 안 하는데도
게임에 대한 이해가 깊어지고 직접 해보고 싶어져서
마참내 나도 21,000 정가 주고 흑우가 되었다.

그로부터 한 600시간쯤 지나 패치도 여러번 있었고,
업데이트, 신종 버그 등등 별의별 일이 많았고,
지겹고 바빠져서 옛날만큼 많이 하지는 않지만

그래도 스팀의 몇 안 되는 좋은 롱런 pvp 겜이다.

나름 공포나 추격이라는 긴장감에 겜 중 지루함 같은 것도 적고,
그런 공포심조차도 나중에는 재미로 승화된다.
꼭 다 죽이려고 하든가 / 킬러 한참 놀리다가 살아나가려고 하든가 / 숨어만 있는 팀탓하려든가
하니까 게임을 즐기기 어렵다고 생각한다.

적당적당히 심심할 때 한 판 하고, 아는 사람도 생기고,
퍽이나 전략도 자주 바꿔보고 하면서 느긋하게 하면
굳이 밸런스나 버그에 고통받지 않을 수 있다.
게임은 우선 재밌어야지~

This really isn't a game made for new players. Don't talk to me about the "grind" when it's literally a game lmfao.
If you plan on playing this game casually, I'd suggest you look elsewhere because despite how they advertise it, you won't have fun unless you're willing to invest a lot of time and have patience with several factors (levelling up, getting new characters, queue times, matchmaking [the likelihood of you facing someone with 1k hours on here with less than 100 hours is very likely].)
I've made some friends and had some pretty good times but I would never recommend this game for anyone who wants to have a good time overall while playing. You're more likely to enjoy 25% of the games you play and 75% of the games you play, you'll want to just leave. (And you'll likely only get to play 4 games in two hours because of queue times.) The community and players from both sides are generally extremely toxic, unforgiving, and unpleasant to interact with.
But, for a list of things wrong with the game: developers are only interested in adding things for cash grabs instead of addressing actual problems, matchmaking, queue times, the ranking system in general, unfriendly to new players, & generally lacking things that you'd find on other games to make the game as enjoyable as possible. While I understand this game is meant to be unbalanced, if you can never find an even ground where both sides of generally satisfied, that's on you. A reason why most players are frustrated when games don't "go their way" could easily be fixed by having shorter queue times considering most games don't force you to wait 20 minutes for a 10 minute game.
Anyway, TLDR, don't play this game casually unless you're okay with basically wasting your time and getting frustrated when you were looking for fun.
Pretty good job so far.
Buenardo

the game is good, a little "try hard-y" unless you're playing in the top ranks, players tend to be a quite toxic, but that's something most multiplayer games have. The multiple killers offer great variety in gameplay, some being easier to play, while others being harder. The game has a steep learning curve for both killers and survivors, but mostly killers, so its not super easy on first time players. Other than that there are a few technical issueas, but nothing too serious. Buy it only if you plan to play consistently, because it takes time to learn how to play and win.

El juego es adictivo, siempre quieres mas... Ya sea como Killer o Superviviente. (+1.800 Horas en el juego). Al principio lo sentia aburrido, pues la mecanica es reparar 5 generadores, abrir puerta y escapar y como killer evitarlo. Hasta que empiezas a entender el juego, cada partida es totalmente diferente ya que no sabes con que tipo de personas puedes jugar. Hay bastantes Bug's  e incluso te puedes encontrar con gente muy toxica (como en todo juego), pero si tienes amigos y tiempo libre tal vez puedas salvar la inversion que se hizo en este juego. Lastimosamente, son mas las cosas malas que buenas y con el pasar del tiempo es decepcionante ver el trabajo que realizan, solo les interesa ganar dinero con skin si arreglar nada del juego. Lentamente, esta muriendo... Pues dejan  que la poca comunidad se marche , solo regresan cada 3 meses a ver el nuevo capitulo, pero el boom solo dura una semana... Si tu intencion es tomarte el juego en serio, NO LO COMPRES NI PIERDAS TU TIEMPO.

I've been playing DBD since beta - the game has its flaws (what game doesn't?), but I still love it and keep coming back to it.  You'll definitely have many rage-filled moments, but it's also really heckin' fun.  Just be aware that it's an imperfect and ever-changing system, and the devs are doing a pretty good job so far ;)

Worst battle pass I've ever seen in a game. There's all these different parts which are confusing, ugly, and overall make no sense. Literally no need to overcomplicate such a simple feature. And the progression is painstakingly slow. Like painful. An hour of gameplay and you MIGHT tier up once (and there's 70 tiers). Oh and the rewards suck. They randomly throw 25 cents worth of the paid currency at you for a completing a tier (okay? I'm insulted). But hey, if you spend 100 hours completing the pass you can earn some cool skins! Or you could just buy them in the shop since they're not exclusive anyway...

Forgot to mention it completely dilutes the objective of the game. Love when little timmy is running around cleansing totems and getting chests for his battle pass instead of actually trying to escape.

BH I hope you continue trying to innovate and add new features. Hopefully something not behind a paywall that adds to the actual gameplay experience and is not just a filler-feature to waste time in between chapters. But if you're gonna hop on the battle-pass bandwagon, at least take notes from fortnite. Simple, actual progression, exclusive cosmetics. Not that hard :)

Very fun game.  I purchased in 2016 but started playing a few weeks ago, just like any other person who uses steam.  I must say, I regret not investing time into this earlier.  The game is especially fun as survivor in my opinion, and you feel heavily rewarded after successfully escaping the killer and cooperating with teammates.  My only complaint is load times take quite awhile if you are not queued alone.  The user interface could use an update / improvements, but the game itself is extremely fun.
